levels.description:
Passive Effect: if there are 2 or more friendly units within Talent 1's range, Vina's SP recovery <@ba.vup>+{sp_recovery_per_sec}/s</>
Upon automatic activation: Attack Range <@ba.vup>+1</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attack target count <@ba.vup>+1</>
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
